id: Risk of early death doubles in deprived parts of the UK compared to more affluent parts, study shows
paragraph: Set edition preference:Set edition preference:Set edition preference:By Nina Avramova, CNNUpdated 5:57 AM ET, Thu October 25, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)Residents of the UK are twice as likely to die early if they live in deprived parts of England than the more affluent parts, a new analysis has revealed.Sign up here to get The Results Are In with Dr. Sanjay Gupta every Tuesday from the CNN Health team.CNN's Meera Senthilingam contributed to this report
